backend/main.mo: Manages change requests with access‑controlled submission, admin review, and storage in a Map with auto‑incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for project feature tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files and their roles in the UI and application structure.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app with updated title and meta description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling the header, footer, and all site sections including two new added sections.
frontend/src/components/aqi/AQIGuide.tsx: Interactive AQI guide using tabs to display category details, risks, and recommended actions with an educational alert.
frontend/src/components/diseases/Conditi: Reusable card component rendering a health condition’s icon, description, symptoms, and protective steps.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying site branding, quick scroll-to-section links, and an educational disclaimer. Implements smooth scrolling for anchor navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation supporting smooth scrolling to page sections. Includes responsive menu toggling via a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopRightC: Fixed bottom-left label displaying site credit text. Non-interactive and styled for visibility.
frontend/src/components/sections/AQICate: Section introducing AQI categories with descriptive text. Renders an AQIGuide component for detailed category information.
frontend/src/components/sections/Disease: Section explaining health impacts of air pollution with a medical disclaimer. Displays a grid of condition cards sourced from content data.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with title, description, action buttons, and a featured image. Buttons scroll to key AQI sections smoothly.
frontend/src/components/sections/IndoorA: Section presenting indoor air quality action areas with icons, descriptions, and actionable steps. Includes quick-win tips and an educational alert.
frontend/src/components/sections/LongTer: Section outlining long-term health effects of air pollution using cards and lists. Includes a medical disclaimer and protective strategy guidance.
frontend/src/components/sections/Prevent: Section offering categorized prevention tips for indoor, outdoor, and mask-related air quality protection. Uses card-based layout with bullet lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Renders a projects showcase with filter controls, displaying bike and car silencer projects with descriptions and images. Uses state to filter items by category.
frontend/src/components/sections/Request: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit change requests with optional section and contact info. Handles login flow, validation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/Symptom: Displays guidance on recognizing pollution-related symptoms and when to seek emergency or routine medical help. Includes alerts and symptom lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vulnera: Explains pollution risks for vulnerable populations and offers protective guidance for groups like children and older adults. Uses cards and alerts for structured info.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIsA: Introduces the AQI, explaining what it measures, why it matters, pollution sources, and how to interpret the scale. Uses cards to organize key concepts.
frontend/src/content/aqiCategories.ts: Exports structured AQI category data including ranges, colors, descriptions, health risks, and recommended actions. Used for rendering AQI-related UI.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines a HealthCondition interface and a list of detailed health conditions related to air pollution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting no backend query hooks exist yet.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitChangeReques: Provides a mutation hook to submit change requests via the backend actor and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, and typography rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and content scanning rules.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, requested website updates, existing features, and new feature requests. Includes architectural notes and configuration for handling content changes without auto-deployment.
